publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2430.1 Alasdair Allan: Happy Birthday, Sir Sean Conneryâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2430) in the name of George Foulkes, after "the people of Scotland," insert "and hopes he will play an equally positive role in the next referendum, on Scottish independence,". Supported by: Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-2430.1 Happy Birthday, Sir Sean Connery (lodged on 26 August 2008) Brian Adam*
